notes:
[Shambling Vent] is a just-over-the-line money pick, it can also help you splash either black or white if it comes to that.

Other than that [Hedron Archive] is my favourite card in the pack. It ramps your mana, and draws you cards. There's even a chance you wheel the [Ruin Processor].

[Molten Nursery]  and [Kalastria Healer] are both good cards in their respective decks, but neither of them are cards you're happy first-picking.
